about_the_game:
check out our new game and dont forget to Wishlist!




You just woke up in a strange place, you can't remember anything, not even your name. Ritual books and weird notes are everywhere, strange things happen all over the place and the horrific noises are driving you crazy! Yet you're still trying to figure everything out, who are you? why are you there? why can't you remember anything?

What to expect from Kuchisake Onna - 口裂け女:

  • Atmospheric environment.
  • Puzzles that actually make sense.
  • Highly intelligent enemy AI.
  • Great storytelling.
  • Proper English.

  • NO cheap jumpscares

Please note that this game is not based of the urban legend, it just uses the Kuchisake Onna spirit as the enemy

Gameplay is arround 30minutes

short_description: Kuchisake-Onna is a first-person horror adventure game based on a Japanese myth. The gameplay focuses on storytelling and stealth to avoid “Kuchisake-Onna” or else the Slit Mouthed Woman, there are also some puzzles for the player to solve, making gameplay more various.
